body_html:
I think having Variable there shows how to create variables. So it adds value.
I also verified that it works on 0.12 as is right now.

So I will close this PR. If you really think we should make this change, please reopen or create a new PR with more explanation.

body:
I think having Variable there shows how to create variables. So it adds value.
I also verified that it works on 0.12 as is right now.

So I will close this PR. If you really think we should make this change, please reopen or create a new PR with more explanation.
